text: And I prayed to the LORD my God and confessed, â€œO, Lord, the great and awesome God, who keeps His covenant of loving devotion 9:4 Forms of the Hebrew chesed are translated here and in most cases throughout the Scriptures as loving devotion; the range of meaning includes love, goodness, kindness, faithfulness, and mercy, as well as loyalty to a covenant. to those who love Him and keep His commandments,
